persionText: از این ستون به آن ستون فرجه
translationEn: From this pillar to that one, there's relief.
meaning: Sometimes delaying or waiting can bring unexpected solutions or relief.

persionText: آب که از سر گذشت، چه یک وجب چه صد وجب
translationEn: Once water passes over your head, whether one inch or a hundred, it doesn't matter.
meaning: When you're already in trouble, the extent of the problem doesn't really matter anymore.

persionText: گر صبر کنی ز غوره حلوا سازی
translationEn: If you're patient, you can make halva from unripe grapes.
meaning: Patience and time can turn difficult situations into sweet outcomes.

translationEn: The neighbor’s chicken is a goose.
meaning: What others have always seems better than what we have.

persionText: کار امروز را به فردا مینداز
translationEn: Don't postpone today’s work to tomorrow.
meaning: Don't procrastinate — do things on time.
